content:
Craft an item of type: wooden_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft a wooden_pickaxe, I need to craft warped_planks first. To craft warped_planks, I need to place stripped_warped_stem in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the stripped_warped_stem from slot 41 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: wooden_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: The warped_planks have been crafted in slot 0. To craft the wooden_pickaxe, I need to move the warped_planks to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: wooden_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a wooden_pickaxe, I need to place 3 planks in a row followed by two sticks below them. Since I have 1 crimson plank at slot 36, I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
